037d8fdc1839f17c.voiceContent: Heh, you never cease to impress me. I mean, taming youkai? Who knew you had that kind of talent

04d8f7b5eee88ba6.voiceContent: By the way, I've been hoping to show you around the Grand Narukami Shrine when we get the chance

052cc7c9fec9b883.voiceContent: I won't let that affect our outings here though. Food and drink's on me, hehe

0656b3dba94bb6bd.voiceContent: Great job here, you really know what you're doing! If you placed this in Inazuma, you could probably steal a good chunk of business from Hanamizaka

074dee35d387964b.voiceContent: Personally, I think a few pets would complete the atmosphere... What do you say

16642c46286a726b.voiceContent: #Night, {NICKNAME}! Try not to kick off all your covers, okay

1710811bcbda8736.voiceContent: On a more serious note, though you may not want to show it... I can see the tiring toll of your journey in your eyes sometimes

23d9e9e953d06e55.voiceContent: Huh, you're not seriously considering it, are you? Trust me, don't let curiosity get the best of you. Attacking a kitsune is bad luck

251c393fa7d097dd.voiceContent: Really? You do? It's great that you know how I feel

2779e070a9c31bd1.voiceContent: Gotcha, Tubby the Teapot Spirit... Wait, what

29803f833d7357b1.voiceContent: And if you ever feel lonely, don't worry — you've always got me here to keep you company

309079903080839f.voiceContent: Regardless, you should probably try not to provoke any animals you encounter, regardless of the species

36deb1169786cf28.voiceContent: Haha, don't worry, I'll be fine. Believe me, I can feel at home almost anywhere

3850ff457c0e8ecd.voiceContent: Even if this crystal-blue sky is just a teapot's illusion, a moment of pure tranquility is a great thing all the same

53dd67950b021032.voiceContent: Not that you'd ever dream of doing something like that... would you

5dd8604e88ad2dd4.voiceContent: Nice teahouse you've got here. I can see you put a lot of thought into the furniture and teaware

64cafc095e838c30.voiceContent: I know an old lady who loves telling stories about the unnatural. She told me that someone was once sentenced to judgment by lightning after attacking one of the kitsune near the shrine

69898d66e539d11e.voiceContent: If you'd like some breakfast, I'd be more than happy to whip something up for ya

6efba9d336f33c0d.voiceContent: You're saying you've got a bird that's smart enough to be a butler? It's not some kind of youkai or anything... Is it

734030f518cac264.voiceContent: That would spell the end for me... I, uh, couldn't help but pat it on the head when I came in..

751d25bebb34d109.voiceContent: Sure! The atmosphere here's really relaxed. It's perfect for chatting the day away

75d8515d90f30fde.voiceContent: Actually, I was hoping to find a nice, open area and invite you to do some skygazing together

78f22e72b575670e.voiceContent: So, how goes the journey? Give me all the details

7a68856f3e58b080.voiceContent: Don't get me wrong, sunset in Inazuma is impressive, too, but somehow it feels a little more... somber than what you have here

7b0d746173407337.voiceContent: Hmm, interesting. So, that teapot youkai... I mean, spirit. Teapot spirit. Did you catch it yourself

85a3459c0135b715.voiceContent: And speaking of the Grand Narukami Shrine, one word of advice... Don't ever attack any of the kitsune nearby

869659adab88b68f.voiceContent: The Sacred Sakura at the shrine is in bloom year-round. Seeing the falling blossoms dance in the wind is quite a sight to behold... definitely a surefire way to make you fall in love with Inazuma

a169fefc0bed95ef.voiceContent: By the way, I really like what you've done with the place... Especially that funny little bird at the entrance..

a45ce58b7df01130.voiceContent: Since we're already here, why not try to leave your worries behind and put your mind at ease for a while

ac5195d37ae5f1ba.voiceContent: Shame I can't flex my fixer muscles around here. In other words... no discounts for Thoma

ae05fc3f4f476982.voiceContent: Oh, and don't worry, you can leave them to me to take care of

c96ce54e5a721a3c.voiceContent: Haha, I guess I always try to see the positive side of things

cb181b37796c85da.voiceContent: Huh, you're right... which is already pretty astonishing. To think that the two of us along with a whole expanse of sky can be packed inside a tiny little teapot

d37a5f65c26b2481.voiceContent: Something about the sky here seems clearer than anywhere else. It makes me feel... peaceful inside

d77e9799ac6e0236.voiceContent: All plants and creatures equally deserve our respect

e8e58bc9cd1d7e0a.voiceContent: Gotcha, Tubby the Butler Bird... Wait, what

e9ee56011e06d2b1.voiceContent: Kitsune are highly favored by the Grand Narukami, so I guess the offender only got what was coming to them

f2140be25d9cc772.voiceContent: Ah, that's good. I always knew that you were a kindhearted person

f5336aecd59838f5.voiceContent: Not a youkai? So... just out of curiosity, this Tubby doesn't happen to be some sort of god or anything, does it

f9501269b6a0482e.voiceContent: I've heard my share of stories, everything from fox envoys, to bake-danuki, to tengu warriors... But a teapot spirit? That's a new one

083c6198548b072c.voiceContent: Uh oh, I'm definitely not okay... Ugh, I need to lie down

107b79641489425d.voiceContent: Sure, why not! We should play again now that everyone knows the rules. I'll see you all later

17ddd09dc2411d63.voiceContent: Almost there now... one final push..

2a3e9f3ca1bf3dbb.voiceContent: Let's all take some much-needed time off. After a few days' rest, we'll reconvene at the Komore Teahouse and discuss our next operation

2d5a2b40ae0b8dce.voiceContent: If we water them regularly to soften the soil, one day their branches might reach into the clouds

39cc2f9f4a9103d7.voiceContent: Perhaps I did get a little carried away... Still, I couldn't be beaten at my own game first time around

3af61bb0f51301f1.voiceContent: So without further ado, I hereby declare that the winner of today's hot pot challenge is... me

64100d54de084ca3.voiceContent: Downtime is hard to come by these days, so be sure to make the most of it

6a451ea4ca5e001a.voiceContent: Careful, there could be more monsters to come

7d87bf3174a5bc2c.voiceContent: ...And the flowers will really flourish now that the weeds are gone

a4e52d44e20e3f72.voiceContent: Ahh... good effort team, another important job taken care of. Next on the agenda some well-earned rest and relaxation

b6775b5be625305a.voiceContent: I'll tidy things up here and start thinking about our ingredients for our next round, hehe

b80ecda78df0d8ce.voiceContent: Haha, guess I've been feeling unlucky recently and wanted the God of Hot Pot's blessing

b938c1b93872e470.voiceContent: I think my luck has already taken a turn for the better — I can sense it

c7b03cacfba6ee1d.voiceContent: Oh — watch your step. Make sure the coast is clear

e7dbed16e8dd09c3.voiceContent: Well, that's all the leaves swept away. The courtyard sure looks a lot cleaner now..

ec6bd928964230fd.voiceContent: While we're here, though, we should water the trees

01416f0fa6588358.voiceContent: I've always wanted to see a tanuki shapeshifting. They say it can change into all kinds of things, and that it likes to play pranks on passersby. It's a creature with a sense of humor, that's for sure

1a8945b81accd1c5.voiceContent: Don't run on the ice... 'cause if you fall down, I won't help you up, you gotta learn somehow

26064abe434d11bf.voiceContent: Without a doubt, my favorite food is Rice Cake Soup. I like cooking up a big, delicious potful for everyone to share. It's a recipe for a good time

2fe5011435f7d6f9.voiceContent: The captain of The Crux — a formidable woman indeed. She once promised to take me out onto the open ocean to get a look at the thunderstorm that seals off Inazuma from the outside world. It's a shame that to this day, I've never had the chance to take her up on the offer..

322235ff303467d9.voiceContent: As far as food is concerned, I'm fine with anything. If we're counting beverages, though... I'm not very good with alcohol. Don't laugh, and before you say it — yes, I've wondered what this says about my identity as a Mondstadter. But, y'know... too much alcohol is bad for you, anyway. So not drinking is a good thing

3907b1a695fc600d.voiceContent: Oh boy, this is getting out of hand..

3cd7aa688ee4b813.voiceContent: Really? This'll make me stronger? You'd better not be kidding, I have stacks of laundry to do

3e01967a3966b60d.voiceContent: I have all of this power, but how should I use it? I need to give this one some serious thought

4249e8d4e7996931.voiceContent: Those that receive Visions should look after them. I certainly don't plan on losing mine

4bf81c8e52b9cf46.voiceContent: I really did spend a lot recently, only 10 Mora left... Still, 10 Mora's better than no Mora

4c36d90d7baf5907.voiceContent: I'm not from Inazuma originally — I think I've told you that before, right? I took a boat all the way here from Mondstadt, found I liked the place, and was also lucky enough to meet the wonderful Kamisato siblings, so I just ended up staying

4d193f4bb6194a67.voiceContent: For me, housework is about keeping a space clean and tidy, so that everyone who lives there has a smile on their face. And now... it looks like I'm responsible for another smile. I'll do my best to deliver

4df0a8ffa1f2d241.voiceContent: What a mess... go on, take a rest

4e2cfaf44b21a123.voiceContent: Hey, how come you're eating here all alone? ...Uh, is it okay if I join you? Or did you just want some space

4e7f5d8066126979.voiceContent: As head of the Kamisato Clan, he's in a tough position. With all the political upheaval, he has to contend with public disquiet on one hand and a bunch of self-serving, degenerate public officials on the other. It's best not to dwell on it. All I can do is make sure to look out for him when he's at home

4feb6c6b261fc498.voiceContent: In my homeland of Mondstadt, almost everyone has great reverence for the Anemo Archon, Barbatos. But people in Inazuma feel a little differently toward the Shogun. How can I put this... They feel love, respect, gratitude... but also fear

506cbdffab07c072.voiceContent: Delicious! Could I get another bowl of rice

508aadcbaa3a6512.voiceContent: I've gotten to know all kinds of people over the years, and I'd say that Inazumans are more particular about etiquette than Mondstadters. If you make sure you're always polite to people, it's much easier to get things done

537fe36ee909b326.voiceContent: Of Naganohara Fireworks fame? She's so easy to get along with. Super straightforward, just says whatever she thinks. Oh, and Naganohara fireworks are just incredible, you should take every chance you get to see them in action. Ah, on that note — here, have a coupon

57d95e1be8f7bd9b.voiceContent: Ah Sayu, stubborn Sayu. I've asked her countless times to teach me ninjutsu, but she always refuses. She even goes out of her way to avoid me now... I'm just a student looking for a teacher, am I really that out of line

590b9634df919d58.voiceContent: Delicious! Could I get another bowl of rice

5d78e4fc6bd3b8ed.voiceContent: For some of the more conservatively minded people in Inazuma, the idea of an outlander working as a retainer for one of the Commissions is unthinkable. So there was a time when I was not that welcome here. I'm pretty sure I'd have been deported a long time ago without a couple of Kamisatos fighting my corner. I couldn't let the clan down after they'd been so kind to me, so I put in a lot of honest work, and eventually, everyone was finally able to accept me

64ff106f6021b402.voiceContent: It's good to meet you at last, Traveler. I've been hearing about you for a long time now. I'm your new buddy, Thoma — as long as that's okay with you, of course

669130a09dd81068.voiceContent: Hey... how about we go for a nice meal some time? My treat, of course

6bcb7cf51abd29df.voiceContent: Are you an animal person, too? If you are, let me take you to the outskirts some time, it's great. I just need to give a whistle, and all these puppies and kittens will come out of nowhere and start strutting around your ankles, clamoring for your affection. Haha, just imagining it is already brightening my day

6c389c6269b0a27c.voiceContent: And that's how you pull off a successful surprise attack

6fcfb912b82ae3ea.voiceContent: Okay, good night. You had a busy day today, you should get some rest, too. Don't stay up too late

72e01679cec683c1.voiceContent: Can't go wrong with one of these

79f603beadc5bd1e.voiceContent: This seems to be my best option

7eefe8925130131e.voiceContent: Thank you for placing your trust in me. Your kindness warms my heart more than the brightest flame ever could. But not to worry, I've figured out what I want to do now. My strength is your shield, and I will always be here to protect you

7ff5f10815567d18.voiceContent: Um, are you free right now? Would you mind sharing some of your cooking tips with me

81ae832e6f82e799.voiceContent: You don't wanna be out in open country in this kind of weather. You'll get struck by lightning for sure

986c34bfacacba7c.voiceContent: I don't think I've ever tasted anything like this... Oh, it's not too bad, though

9c5478d09ace53da.voiceContent: Come quick, we gotta get down to the market — they slash the prices on fish around this time of day. Oh, and if you find something that you just can't do without, I'll help you haggle the price down

a02b0b633984eb0b.voiceContent: I guess the housework can wait

a1553774e4075665.voiceContent: Where are we headed this time

a2f76b263102b6a0.voiceContent: Anything I can lend a hand with? If something needs doing around the house or you're having some interpersonal strife, just say the word. Hmm? A conversation... I see, I see. That's a little different from what I'm used to, but I'm all for it

a465841c13ba2d0d.voiceContent: Mm! The fortune slip was right..

aa658bad4496608d.voiceContent: It was never Ayaka or Ayato's intention to make me the housekeeper, I volunteered. I like this kind of work. Putting everything in order gives me a great sense of achievement, and based on everyone's reactions... Yeah, I think I do a pretty good job

aab9638c808b0c48.voiceContent: You've had a run-in with Eula Lawrence before, huh? All I know is that their whole family are about the worst-tempered people you could ever meet. You're better off steering clear of them if you can help it. Ah, now I'm in a Mondstadt mood again... The memories

b600a582f9bcfed4.voiceContent: Lady Miko? Wh—What about her? *sigh* Every time Miss Kamisato sends me out to deliver messages, my least-favorite destination is the Grand Narukami Shrine... Oh! N—Not because Lady Miko scares the bejeebers out of me, it's, uh... respect. Yes! She strikes respect deep into my heart, ahahahaha..

b85bd54f51426252.voiceContent: Um, are you free right now? Would you mind sharing some of your cooking tips with me

ba767a509a861e1f.voiceContent: Honestly, I don't harbor any resentment toward the Shogun. Yes, she almost took my Vision away, but ultimately that's just because of her unique perspective. Everyone has their own perspective, there's nothing strange about that.The only thing I don't understand is her goal in doing so. What does she imagine eternity really looks like for Inazuma? And why is sacrificing her people's aspirations so necessary to achieve it? I can neither understand nor agree with her approach

bc6c6d4a9d414644.voiceContent: I've been really getting into stories about the unnatural recently. Especially ones about shapeshifting youkai — they're so fascinating. Before that, I was really into ninjutsu for a while, and before that... Hmm? You think I'm not dedicated enough? N—No! It's not like that, you got me all wrong

d11b7e86123d232f.voiceContent: I feel like there's something I forgot to do... hmm, I tidied the courtyard, put the tea on... Eh, it's probably just my mind playing tricks on me

d134f00201480f62.voiceContent: Where'd this rain come from? Are you gonna be okay? Here, I'll lend you my coat..

d2837c831aad6b7c.voiceContent: It feels like... a fire inside of me has just begun to burn

d7549dc86ecaa1f9.voiceContent: Hmm... Word on the street is that he's quite a character — apparently, he even has youkai heritage. Have you met him? If you two are close, maybe you could introduce me sometime. It's good to make friends from all walks of life... youkai included

dc2db7030f5072d9.voiceContent: I'm in a real pickle here. The chief is hosting a banquet for his friends tonight, and he says he wants me to splurge a little by cooking some Butter Crab. The only problem is that for the last two days, I haven't been able to buy crab anywhere! So, what, am I gonna have to dive into the ocean and grab them myself

dd512c6098fb4ec4.voiceContent: Milady is in all respects a well-rounded person erudite, compassionate, well-mannered, and elegant... The one thing she could do better is to speak her mind more. In fact, watch out for this the next time you're talking to her — sometimes, she looks like she's about to say something, but then she holds back. If that happens, keep asking her opinion, see if you can encourage her to open up a little

e0e72f2343317add.voiceContent: Ho, that guy is a detective for the Tenryou Commission. He seems to have his own way of doing things — not the easiest person to get along with. Also... Any situation that involves a detective is probably not one that's going to end well. I think I'll keep on giving him a wide berth

e3407f75fd82ad50.voiceContent: Morning! If you're free, why not come with me to the market? The vegetables are freshest earlier in the day

e86ad5b8f73178ba.voiceContent: If you hadn't put yourself out there during the Vision Hunt Ceremony and taken on the Raiden Shogun all by yourself, I would've lost my Vision, and with it all my aspirations. I've been thinking about this a lot, and it seems like there's only one way I could ever properly repay you... I, Thoma, give to you my weapon and my loyalty, and I promise to fight for you, no matter what

efc642790432c824.voiceContent: Lovely weather we're having! Will you join me for a walk

f1facb054d1a6d5c.voiceContent: I'm not sure if I should get into this, but... Ah, hopefully you won't mind. I went through a period where I really just wanted to go home — Mondstadt is my homeland, after all. But I was torn... It wouldn't be easy to leave Inazuma behind, either. I mean, just look how good the people here have been to me. The Kamisato Clan always has a room for me, and there are people I've met here that are like family. So, I went back and forth over it, and ultimately decided I'd stay in Inazuma. When I'm missing Mondstadt... I can just chat with you. You don't mind my rambling, do you

f324b716f79c6b7e.voiceContent: I get homesick once in a while, too, so I completely relate to all the international merchants on Ritou. I try to look out for them as much as I can. The difference between us is that they see themselves as just passing by, and have no intention of trying to integrate here. And because that's how they think, it becomes their reality. The majority of Inazumans will never see them as anything more than outsiders

f34f7d7bebc75994.voiceContent: Let's get out there and make some friends

f3b59af7735f989e.voiceContent: Don't despair, I'm here to help

f46ce298941c93fe.voiceContent: I don't think I've ever tasted anything like this... Oh, it's not too bad, though

f61365f2b64420bb.voiceContent: Quick, come with me! I remembered it's your birthday, obviously, so I thought I'd throw you a proper party. There's food, there's drinks, and I invited a whole bunch of your friends, too. Hey, this is your birthday we're talking about! I wasn't about to let you spend it all alone

f88d14b523cfd98d.voiceContent: Oh, so Jean from the Gunnhildr Clan is the Master of the Knights of Favonius now? She definitely deserves it, she's known all over for her impeccable conduct... Oh, just the Acting Grand Master? Haha, well, someone of her standing won't care about titles

fb2f3e805ee67e8c.voiceContent: On the lunch menu today, we have Sakura Tempura and Tricolor Dango! Here, there's some for you, some for Paimon, and I also put some aside for milady and the man of the clan himself. Ah, wait, I forgot someone... There's none for me..

fee1246df4e5ebdb.voiceContent: The Tenryou Commission General... Mm... Make sure to be extra careful if you have any dealings with her. She has a lot of power in her hands, and she's not very open to persuasion. Smiling and batting your eyelids certainly won't get you anywhere with her
